Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to reducing the embodied carbon emissions of buildings and building materials
Summary: Relates to reducing the embodied carbon emissions of buildings and building materials; provides that construction permitted under the state building code shall achieve a 15 percent reduction in embodied carbon emissions by 2030; provides three options for compliance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to reducing the embodied carbon emissions of buildings and building materials
